    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String KEY_ANYTIME
      Configuration key to enable/disable usage of anytime assignments.
      static String KEY_DCOP_ITERATIONS
      The number of iterations max that an algorithm can perform before the agents take a definitive decision for each timestep.
      static String KEY_GREEDY_CORRECTION
      Configuration key to enable/disable the sequential greedy correction of assignments.

        public List<String> getUsedConfigurationKeys()
        Description copied from interface: Solver
        Get the list of configuration keys employed by this solver. This list will be used to output the configuration values when writing the results file.
        Specified by:
        getUsedConfigurationKeys in interface Solver
        Overrides:

        list of configuration keys used by this solver.

      • getIdentifier

        public String getIdentifier()
        Description copied from interface: Solver
        Get the identifier of this solver. The identifier should contain both the solver type and the particular solving algorithm being employed. I.e.: DCOP_MaxSum
        Returns:
        string identifier of the solver

      • getUtility

        public double getUtility(ProblemDefinition problem,
                         Assignment solution)
        Description copied from class: AbstractSolver
        Get the utility obtained by the given solution. This utility function must be defined at the solver level. It can be modeled to represent the distribution probability of the solution given the problem
        Specified by:
        getUtility in class AbstractSolver
        Parameters:
        problem - definition of the problem
        solution - instance to evaluate
        Returns:
        the utility of the problem given the assignment
